Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, this product is truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For a limited time, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $200. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the difference for yourself. If you're interested, please let me know and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
